comments.author: cjones.bugs@gmail.com
comments.creator: cjones.bugs@gmail.com
comments.text: Back when we supported --disable-ipc, we made dirs that were IPC-enable-able include chromium-config.mk.  But now all dirs are IPC-enable-able, so we should unconditionally export the needed headers to dist/include.
comments.raw_text: Back when we supported --disable-ipc, we made dirs that were IPC-enable-able include chromium-config.mk.  But now all dirs are IPC-enable-able, so we should unconditionally export the needed headers to dist/include.
